description:
In this video you can hear the pain behind the voice of a man who knew he would be subjecting his family to unbelievably cruel & unfair treatment.

But you also see the reactions of his family members who knew the sake of our country’s future was on the line & they believed in him to save it.

God bless the Trump family! We will never be able to repay you for your sacrifices. 🙏🏻
